text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much, Rice. 
Thanks to your message, my status 
has been updated to "Delighted."
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
But I... I'm so sorry. I spent so long 
thinking about a present that you'd like, 
but wasn't able to decide in time...
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text:
I have a proposal. Since it's my 
birthday, would you fulfil a request 
for me?
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
Yes. My bodily maintenance requires 
me to occasionally perform the task 
of lying down and basking in the sun.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
I hereby ask you to join me, and to help 
me complete the goal of "lying down 
together." Do you accept?
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
When we lie side-by-side, the short 
distance should allow us to easily 
share information with each other.
text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon

text_block_list.text:
Let's rest together while chatting 
in the cozy warmth of the sunlight!
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
